Description

Registers default Bukkit-specific config adapters.
BukkitAudienceWrapper
Wraps a Bukkit CommandSender as a platform-agnostic Audience.

Bukkit-specific platform hooks for the command engine.
BukkitCommandWrapper
Bukkit command wrapper for integrating custom command logic with Bukkit's command system.
BukkitConsoleAudience
Console audience that routes messages through a JUL logger with proper levels.
BukkitExternalPlaceholderEngine
Placeholder engine that bridges to PlaceholderAPI when available.
BukkitPlaceholderRegistrar
Registers MagicPlaceholders with Bukkit placeholder backend when available.
BukkitPlatformLogger
Lightweight bridge to Bukkit's plugin logger.
BukkitPlatformProvider
Platform provider for Bukkit/Paper runtime.
CommandRegistry
Handles registration and initialization of commands in the plugin.
ComponentAdapter
MiniMessage-based adapter for Adventure Component in configs.
HelpCommand
Simple help command that lists all registered commands and their subcommands.
Integration<T>
Abstract class for all integrations with external plugins Provides basic logic for availability checking and initialization
IntegrationManager
Manager for handling and safely loading integrations Provides centralized management of all plugin integrations
LanguageKeyTypeParser
Type parser for language key suggestions.
LogBuilder
Bukkit-specific log builder with Player/CommandSender helpers.
Logger
Bukkit/Paper logger adapter backed by LoggerCore.
LoggerExamples
Examples of using the new unified logger system.
MagicGui
Advanced GUI system with MiniMessage support and convenience methods.
MagicItem
Fluent builder for creating ItemStacks with MiniMessage support.
NoopEngine
No-op placeholder engine that returns text unchanged Used when PlaceholderAPI is unavailable
OfflinePlayerTypeParser
Type parser for OfflinePlayer arguments.
PapiEngine
Real PlaceholderAPI integration IMPORTANT: PlaceholderAPI imports are only in this class! This class is loaded only if PlaceholderAPI is present

PlaceholderEngine
Interface for placeholder processing
PlayerTypeParser
Type parser for Player arguments with @sender support and automatic suggestions.
PrefixedLogger
Logger instance with custom prefix.
ScheduleUtils
Utility class for scheduling tasks and countdowns in Bukkit/Spigot.
ScheduleUtils.CountdownTask
A task that counts down from a given number of seconds.
SlotPolicy
Defines the behavior and rules for a specific slot in a GUI.
SlotPolicy.Builder
Builder for creating slot policies.
WorldAdapter

WorldTypeParser
